medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Patient was in usual state of health until earlier this week when she developed abdominal pain and constipation. Initially able to pass bowel movements with Miralax. Over the last day, abdominal pain worsened with sharper pain and emesis. Although the pain has improved slightly, it persisted prompting a visit to the ER.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Coronary artery disease (CAD), hypertension, gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), chronic back pain, colon cancer (no postoperative chemotherapy/radiation), hearing loss, gait disturbance, osteoarthritis, iron deficiency anemia, renal insufficiency, osteoporosis, hypercholesterolemia, history of myocardial infarction.
